Title: The Hunt
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Taylor Elmore, Keith Schreier, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole" by)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Jere Burns, Joelle Carter
Plot: Raylan takes a break from the case to take a visit from Winona and their daughter, Boyd takes Ava to his cabin to confront her about her loyalty, and Ty is on the run without any help after the shootout with the marshals.
